info.description: API specification for the Python or R model container that is generated by SAS Model Manager.
info.title: Python Model and R Model Container API

get.summary: Get swagger API documentation for the web service
get.description: Retrieves the swagger API documentation for the web service.

200.description: The request succeeded. The swagger API documentation for the service was returned.

get.summary: Check the status of the service
get.description: This endpoint enables you to perform a simple health (status) check to make sure that the service is available at any given time.

200.description: If the service is available, this response returns with the content 'pong'.

default.description: The service could not be executed because of an unexpected error.

post.summary: Performs scoring with specified input data in the container instance
post.description: Performs scoring with specified input data in the container instance.

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: The input data within a CSV file.

201.description: The request succeeded. The test ID was returned.

400.description: The request was invalid. The CSV file doesn't exist

get.description: Returns the test results in a CSV file when the query execution has completed.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the test results.

404.description: The test results could not be found.

get.description: Returns the execution log for the test results.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of the test results.

200.description: The execution log for the test results was returned.

404.description: The execution log could not be found.

get.description: Returns the Gunicorn service log for the system.

404.description: The system log could not be found.
